name: Beyond Orbit
description:
Beyond Orbit

Developed for LDJam 47 

Theme: Stuck in a Loop

You play the spaceship of Buddy Lightbeard, and you have taken a mission to destroy all of the planets in the star system!  This is the last mission right?

To win, you must learn the orbiting mechanics of the game and orbit each planet. You must then orbit the home planet to win :) I wonder what secrets lie at the endgame ;) ?!??

Developers:

Zypo: Art + Programming

Schwam: Programming and Game mechanics

paulcalabro: Music and Audio
